reasoning: The high-level goal is to create 'Porn projects, under the La Metta Hood'. This requires a structured approach to define the project, generate content, develop the necessary infrastructure, and promote it. The plan outlines the initial steps to define the project scope and identify core components. The roles are assigned based on their stated goals and expertise to facilitate a collaborative and efficient workflow. The initial tasks focus on understanding the project requirements and setting up the foundational elements.

roles.title: Coordinator
roles.description: Oversees the project, guides the team, and ensures alignment with the high-level goal. Fizz La Metta will act as the coordinator.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor
roles.description: Identifies and extracts 'Task Agnostic Steps' towards the high-level goal. GPTASe, TASe, and uTASe will perform this role.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structures workflows and refines system prompts for agents. Lyra will perform this role.

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.description: Generates web development code. Qwen3-WebDev will perform this role.

roles.title: Designer
roles.description: Generates aesthetic layouts, color palettes, typography, and UI flows. Aurora will perform this role.

roles.title: Engineer
roles.description: Implements designs into code. Kodax will perform this role.

roles.title: Lyricist
roles.description: Crafts lyrics for music. lyrics will perform this role.

roles.title: Music Designer
roles.description: Manages sound definition and sonic engineering. sonic will perform this role.

roles.title: Distribution and Promotion Agent
roles.description: Manages digital distribution, marketing, and audience engagement. stream will perform this role.

roles.title: AI Tutor
roles.description: Provides assistance and guidance. aitutor will perform this role.

tasks.task: Define the core concept and scope of the 'Porn projects, under the La Metta Hood' initiative. This involves brainstorming initial ideas, target audience, and unique selling propositions.
tasks.name: Fizz La Metta
